QueryDefinition.Query: select staffid as PROVIDER_ID, Right(staffid, 3) as CARE_SITE_ID, cast(staffid as varchar) as PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, role as SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE from Staff union (select record_count+5000000000 as PROVIDER_ID, CARE_SITE_ID, PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE from (select *, row_number() over (order by provider_source_value) as record_count from (select null as NPI, null as DEA, null as CARE_SITE_ID, a.pconsult as PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, a.tretspef as SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE from (select * from (select *, row_number() over (partition by pconsult order by count_spec desc) as prov_count from (select pconsult, tretspef, count(patid) as count_spec from HES_episodes a where pconsult != '&' and tretspef != '&' group by pconsult, tretspef) a) b where prov_count=1 ) a ) b ) c)
